overview:
Melody Heales is an Australian List Consultant from List Australia (LA) at Melbourne. She can help you find Australian lists for your marketing - based on industry, revenue size, employee size, geographical location, title, interests, gender, state, zip code, SIC etc.

Business and Consumer lists from List Australia (LA)can help you penetrate the rich Australian trade markets and grow your business.

Our Lists are suitable for Direct Mailing Campaigns, Email Marketing Campaigns, Telemarketing Campaigns, Fax Campaigns, Text Campaigns and other promotions targeted at Australian audience.

Melody Heales Specialties: I specialize in developing niche Australian B2B Lists. Some of the top selling Australian databases that I have developed include: Australian Business Direct Mailing List Australian Business Opt-in Email List Australian Business Telemarketing List Australian Business Fax Number List

Apart from these, the products I promote include industry specific lists for Australia. At List Australia, I also manage Australian custom list building services and database appending projects.
